#### Now hiring

Interested in invasive species? Are you into waterfowl? Thinking of pursuing a research or state wildlife agency job? I’m hiring a Master’s student focusing on invasive species ecology and management to join my lab at the [Arkansas Cooperative Fish & Wildlife Research Unit](https://www1.usgs.gov/coopunits/unit/Arkansas). The student would start August 2021. For more information and how to apply, check out this [link](). Let me know via email if you have questions (cr065@uark.edu).

#### Prospective graduate students

I'm on the lookout for new students to work on a variety of wildlife-related projects with our cooperators at Arkansas Game & Fish Commission. If you're interested, send me an email with your CV (cr065@uark.edu).
